channel.title: :house: Home on purplecat
channel.description: Recent content in :house: Home on purplecat

item.title: :runner: Usage
item.description: $ purplecat -h purplecat version 0.2.0 purplecat [OPTIONS] <PROJECTs...|BUILD_FILEs...> OPTIONS -c, --cache-type <TYPE> specifies the cache type. (default: default). Available values are: default, ref-only, newdb and memory. --cachedb-path <DBPATH> specifies the cache database path (default: ~/.config/purplecat/cachedb.json). -d, --depth <DEPTH> specifies the depth for parsing (default: 1) -f, --format <FORMAT> specifies the result format. Default is 'markdown'. Available values are: CSV, JSON, YAML, XML, and Markdown. -l, --log-level <LOGLEVEL> specifies the log level.

item.title: :smile: About
item.description: 📜 License This license permits 👍 Commercial use, 👍 Modification, 👍 Distribution, and 👍 Private use. 🎃 Logo This image comes from https://pixy.org/4693873/ (CC-0). 📛 Project name come from? The project name come from the children book, titled “Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What do you see?” by Bill Martin, Jr. and Eric Carle. I read the book to my child many times by her request. The purple cat is the most favorit character of her.
